steps.name: chapter_one
steps.text: You are in the zoo playground, eating ice cream from a cone.  A drop melts and falls to the ground.  You look down and notice a small creature eat it then skuttle off.

opts.text: Carry on eating the ice cream.

steps.name: more_ice_cream
steps.text: It's delicious, and you even find a big blob of chocolate at the bottom of the cone.

steps.name: follow
steps.text: You follow the creature and notice it looks strangely shiny.  It burrows under some of the play equipment, through the soft wood chippings.  You go closer and notice a small hole.  Brushing aside the wood chip you find a small hatch in the ground.  You decide to...

opts.text: cover it back up so nobody notices and call for backup.
open the hatch to peek inside.
